title: BRIEF-Oilex Announces Expanded Operational Role For Chairman
text:
BRIEF-Oilex Announces Expanded Operational Role For Chairman

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 06, 2019 21:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Oilex Announces Expanded Operational Role For Chairman Sept 6 (Reuters) - Oilex Ltd : * OILEX LTD - ANNOUNCE EXPANDED OPERATIONAL ROLE FOR MR BRADLEY LINGO, CHAIRMAN OF OILEX LTD * OILEX LTD - EXPANDED ROLE, WHICH IS INTERIM IN NATURE, WILL FOCUS ON DEVELOPMENT AND IMPLEMENTATION OF COMPANY'S COOPER-EROMANGA BASIN STRATEGY

BRIEF-Oilex Announces Expanded Operational Role For Chairman
description: BRIEF-Oilex Announces Expanded Operational Role For Chairman
